title: Marykeller
author: Marykeller
content: The hardship of the country d make people do unspeakable thing this days just to dupe their own people money, not minding the outcome. Nowadays people just d go d extreme to arrange kidnapping of themselves just to raise ransom indirectly for themselves. Self kidnap don become another line of business for some people. How did we get to this level? And how we go take counter this self kindnap businessLink for the story https://gazettengr.com/pastor-allegedly-kidnaps-self-twice-collects-ransom-from-church-members/Wetin be the least thing wey you don hear so far for Nigeria wey make you d wonder wetin d country d turn out to? Let's share our experience of wetin we don see or hear so far of wetin hardship don make people do for d country

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Most of this news no really dey me strange again because even before now, bible been don talk so for the last days, plenty unbelievable things go sub and from the look of thing, e come be like say we don ready dey the last days be this.But most of this men wey we dey regard as men of God no really dey holy or righteous based on the kind things wey we dey see and hear lately.We don hear of how pastor dey sleep with people wife and we don hear so many incredible things about most men of God wey no really sharp at all.The issue of self kidnapping don happen of recent for my neighborhood wey one guy kidnap himself so he fit collect money from him people so he fit use flex him babe wey dey ask for human hair.To me self kidnapping na madness and anybody wey involve for that matter suppose dey prison.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Just because he is a Pastor doesn't mean his sympathizers will not suspect something is weird about it. I wonder what he did to the money that he had to do it again. Justifying it might help his sympathizers understand.I'm not from Nigeria but this is a developing country with so many resources afaik, this country even has oil and gas of their own. But then you know the number and the kind of crimes reflect how the economic status of the country.

comments.author: Coyster
comments.body: Lol, this one na funny matter oh, i no go call this one business sha, because people wey fit run this kind thing no go plenty, and me i no believe say e they predominantly happen for Naija. Well as the matter be now we go trust our security personnel to they fish out people like this, but the reason why person go even fake their kidnap na because real kidnapping don they too much for Naija, and police no they ever solve the issue, so people believe say even if them fake their kidnap, police no go do any investigation and e go they hard to find out say na the person plan everything.

comments.author: sokani
comments.body: See wetin hunger dey cause... You kidnap yourself, church go donate ransom money give you and go come climb alter again dey preach. This one na hustler and e clear say this man of God na im call himself because God no go fit call this kind person.

comments.author: Dzwaafu11
comments.body: OP these kind things no be new thing for the country as far as person fit him self or relative, siblings you can see all these are small small things why but wetin person go reason be say why person no hustle and get for him self why all scamming things they sub..The pastor you're saying now he don't really think about the outcome why will he did such thing for his people na only God knows the kind of money wey him don get with those people but he still dump them e no make sense make try they hustle for him self

comments.author: SmartCharpa
comments.body: Nothing person no fit see from this country, but i think i didn't it out of financial problems which he might ask from the church members and they couldn't give him, no be the first time wey him take do this kind of thing kidnapping himself before, but i think he later regret his actions, all this thing na lack of good government a pastor of all Church kidnapped himself for the financial problem.this country is just turning into something else.

comments.body: Lol, all dis na gimmicks wey men dey run for the street to use colet RBS from their rich brothers or relative wey no dey reason Dem well. But now all dis pipo wey call Demselvs com dey claim man of God don com dey join run di business. It's like d church get big men dem buy Dem bin no dey bread d pastor well naim say mk him use dis method colet from Dem.This con3 some news person go dey hear go just dey funny person. Abeg anybody wey sabi di pastor mk una tell am say mk him com mk I introduce am into BTC investment, na one of the sure way now.

comments.author: HajiBagi
comments.body: Smile, this matter dey funny I swear, I no know waiting I go talk self because this thing na unbelievable o, pastor by himself take play this kind of risk just to get money from another people, chaiii this issue fit spoil religion I swear because some people will not believe in some pastor again and all this due that they are paying in church, but me I think pastors they normally get money from church due to some tax paying by church members because no matter how pastor no fit talk say him no dey Chop from church money but this one wey baba go kidnapped himself no make sense.

comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.body: News like this dey make me cringe. Like WFT. People like this are giving bad names to the priesthood. This person is not a pastor and can never be. He is just a business person. I can imagine the type of sermons he preaches to his congregations. He should be first flogged or his properties sold, the money recovered and distributed back to members who donated for his so-called release. In addition, the FG who enact a punishment for folks like this. Maybe 6 months in prison depending on the so called ransom money he collected from people.

comments.author: DaNNy001
comments.body: When you think you have heard it all in dis country the more surprises wey this naija, our beloved country get to show us. Well e no be new thing again for some people because na so so different kind of obnoxious and sad story dem wey we day hear everytimes for news. But this particular news kinda dey funny sha because how person go kidnap him own self for the sake of collecting ransom from his members, and with the couple fact say him na even pastor sef. Some people sef no just dey fear god at all

comments.author: Asiska02
comments.body: News of self-abduction is nothing new for us in Naija, but seeing a pastor kidnap himself twice is just too hilarious to imagine. He should not have participated in such an act as a man of God. He has only tarnished the image of the church, and the surrounding community will always regard him as an untrustworthy individual. We know the country is difficult, but there are some things we should train our minds not to think about. I'm hoping that things will change soon.

comments.author: Hyphen(-)
comments.body: No be only Pastor they run this kind fake kidnapping business, I don see so many people wey go hide the selves come make some set up with calls saying that dem kidnap them because them see say them get parent or family member get enough money wey dem no fit get by just asking them to give.But baba make I no lie you, na Poverty de cause all this kind heartless thinking, because normal person no go demand ransome from his parent or relatives. I just they pray make we get better leaders wey no go they selfish and go take care of us.

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: Na wa oh make God help us especially the men of God wey don plenty for Nigeria, everybody won be pastors as them don see say church na business wey be say church members money go dey their hand for them to chop and if e happen say the money no dey their possession, them go come up with another means just to still collect money.No be everybody wey say e be pastor be real pastor,some dey use in the name of pastor dey carry out their evil deeds,no be any church wey them invite you na e u go because end time don come and devil himself na pastor now LOL. Poverty for the country make people dey use God name dey hustle to survive.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: I won’t blame or use poverty as an excuse for someone who intentionally plans their own abduction/Kidnap for them to be able to get money of their loved once.Kidnapping is a hot topic here even now that many Kidnappers are putting or making use of crypto-Currency as a medium of transactions.  Self kidnapping is a selfish avenue and I think it’s should be given same sentencing as a real deal kidnapping.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Who would be surprised at this sort of news these days? I believe only a few people can be moved by this kind of news. If not for the sake of hardship, there would have been no need for the pastor to kidnap himself. But it's absurd that such an incident was carried out by a pastor, lol. Men of God these days are just using God's name to cover up their criminal acts; a true man of God would beg instead of partaking in such an act. I wonder how hard it was for the church members who helped raise the money to pay his ransom. Despite the level of hardship he has faced to make him commit such an act, there is no reason to justify his actions. What baffles me is how he escaped the first time; God showed mercy as he was not caught, and he tried the second time. Although I have heard about five cases of self-kidnapping, none were pastor.

comments.author: Smartvirus
comments.body: Na waa o, the hustle don take another dimension and this one no funny shah, e just show how lazy some people don be when it comes to making money legitly. This religion business cef eh, e don dey on another level o. The way people care dey seek God eh, this God way dey everywhere na em people dey fine like say, e get particular place way them keep am. So tay, e don mak dis religious leaders dey brain wash and cause some other inhuman crime to society.Anyway, people just need grow up shah. Na to avoid circumstances like this make Catholic Church refuse payment of ransom for kidnapped priest. Make them cucuma no con turn target and cases as in OP no go dey come up. Make people try dey learn abeg!

comments.body: Na d legit be that ooo, when member's no dy gree give better offering again pastor they find money now, pastor self wan buy Benz now and again d way things come hard dis days na on god oo. But Sha it's very bad for someone that's is preaching the words of God to the involved in this kind act wetin him wan teach the followers.

comments.author: KupaCrypto
comments.body: Omo this self kidnap business done dey serious, person go just stage em own kidnapping just because say em wan collect money, I know of a family whose  son stage his kidnap and requested for a 5 million naira ransom on hearing it that his son was kidnapped the man slumped and died, now the boy has lost his dad no one to pay the money now the dad has died ..so staging kidnapping is not a good one .I remember in NYSC when they told us that nysc won't pay money for any kidnap victim we were told to be careful as some corp members stage Der own kidnap.

comments.author: Silver005
comments.body: Well my opinion to this,is that I know it's real self kidnapping, but this is the worst thing a human being who is is breathing in air can do to himself, because of money no matter how hard the country may be or life may treat you, because you are creating a havocs to you and your entire generation, you suffer your own family or relations or friends to pay ransom and you know full well that no body kidnapped you you are just seeking for a means of getting money from your own people, the worst of it is that you call yourself a Man of God and on Sunday you will bondly stand on the altar of God saying that God sent you and you think you will go free,no wonder bible says that on the last day judgement will start from the church..
